message.content:
I need to identify the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the income statement, I can find the tax information:
- There is a line item labeled "Tax Expense" with a value of 39599.66 on 2024-02-03.

In the balance sheet, I can see:
- "Taxes Payable" with an end amount of 39599.66 on 2024-02-03.

Also, in the cash flow statement:
- "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" is listed as 39599.66 on 2024-02-03.

All these line items consistently show the same value of 39599.66, which represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period.

{"solution": {'value': '39599.66'}}
